Summary Strategic partner and chief administrative officer for Stanford's School of Earth Sciences. Work closely with Dean and other school leaders to guide and nurture the development of the organization. Oversee all operational areas, including finance, HR, IT, research administration, compliance, facilities, as well as several programmatic areas.  
 
My goal is to transition to a senior position in a foundation or other non-profit organization in Northern California.
